I recommend add this to ur chrome for the best utube experience ever

Magic Actions for YouTube

chrome... ..google. ...com/webstore/detail/abjcfabbhafbcdfjoecdgepllmpfceif

Magic Actions for YouTube

A super new look and features for YouTube! Sexy Backlight, AutoHD, Mouse Wheel Volume Control, Auto Wide, and more!
Magic Actions for YouTubeâ„˘ is a lightweight and useful add-in designed for a more comfortable watching experience. 


AutoHD feature - start play all YouTube videos in HD
+ Highres > HD1080p > HD720p > 480p > 360p > 240p
+ YouTube with a HTML5 video player!

 Instant control over volume by scrolling mouse wheel!
+ OSD on-screen display  
+ YouTube with a HTML5 video player!

Cinema Mode - 1-click and the whole page is shaded
 Make you feel as if you were in a movie theater!
 Click again to toggle back to the normal view
Over 20 predefined color themes
 Auto Wide - always play in wide player mode
Enlarge thumbnails on mouse over
Display avatars and user info in comments
Expand -  expand videos to full window size
Autoplay - manage whether or not the initial video will autoplay
allow/deny preloading a video on youtube
Replay - repeat, replay a video again and again
Autohide Player Controls - video controls will automatically hide after a video begins playing
Hide Annotations

ok this wat u do 

if u messed up UNINSTALL 

then install , when it says DO U WANT PREMIUM OR FREE jus go to TASK MANAGER and close that exe for the program , then COPY PASTE the 2 crack files to the PROGRAM FILES DIRECTORY FOR the folder it installed it in  , it will ask do u want to OVERWRITE say yes, then close everything , RESTART, and then ur good
